['', 'Develop and implement data collection systems including other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency with good data quality.', 'Shall acquire data from primary or secondary data sources with a view to maintaining databases.', 'CODICE Areas Of Expertise Include', 'Analyze results using statistical techniques to provide or write reports using statistical techniques to write program reports.Develop and implement data collection systems including other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency with good data quality.Shall acquire data from primary or secondary data sources with a view to maintaining databases.Identify, analyze and interpret trends, patterns and performance indicators to locate and clarify any code problems that shall develop.Filter and clean computer or system reports, ensure that printouts are legible always and shall work collaboratively with program managers, evaluators and quality assurance team to ensure and enhance performance.', 'Filter and clean computer or system reports, ensure that printouts are legible always and shall work collaboratively with program managers, evaluators and quality assurance team to ensure and enhance performance.', 'Analyze results using statistical techniques to provide or write reports using statistical techniques to write program reports.', 'Identify, analyze and interpret trends, patterns and performance indicators to locate and clarify any code problems that shall develop.', 'The Data Analyst Shall Perform The Following Duties']

opportunity to solve analytical problems within a cross-functional team to drive our products to our customers and be a part of saving people’s lives every day.', 'Enthusiastic about extracting build of internal tools, improvement in internal process, etc.\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating, managing and refining the system used for incoming data requests\xa0\xa0Identifying inefficiencies in the ways in Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways.', 'Good facilitation skills to work with cross-functional teams\xa0', 'Proficient in R and/or Python, C#', 'To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there, you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.', 'Analyzing user behavior data to support program development and report generation\xa0', 'Working with the deployment team to understand data and context unique to clients and to deliver metrics and performance data\xa0', 'To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience', 'Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran', 'Our Implementation and Customer Success team and as our data analyst you will be solving analytical problems within a cross-functional team to drive increases in revenue and team performance. ', 'Evaluating new product features through analysis\xa0\xa0', 'Analyzing patient engagement data and A/B tests to support product development\xa0', 'Proficient with\xa0Powerpoint\xa0and creating presentations from the data created', 'You are a part of', 'Bachelors in Computer Science, Analytics,\xa0Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering or related field OR work experience of the equivalent accepted', 'In return, we offer you', 'Understanding complex data to transform and breakdown raw data\xa0', 'Analyzing current state data analysis process and identify ways to increase analysis process efficiency through the build of internal tools, improvement in internal process, etc.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'You are responsible for', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills\xa0', 'Work closely with our deployment team to understand data and context unique to each client and deliver well-suited analyses\xa0', 'It is the policy of Philips to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all colleagues and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, pregnancy/childbirth, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or perceived disability, genetic information, citizenship, veteran or military status or a person’s relationship or association with a protected veteran, including spouses and other family members, marital or domestic partner status, or any other category protected by federal, state and/or local laws.', "As an equal opportunity employer, Philips is committed to a diverse workforce. In order to ensure reasonable accommodation for individuals protected by Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Vietnam Veterans' Readjustment Act of 1974, and Title I of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, applicants that require accommodation in the job application process may contact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.", 'Understanding complex data associations to combine data from multiple sources\xa0', 'Proficient in Excel, SQL or other querying languages\xa0and open and quick to learn new querying and statistical computing languages\xa0', 'Passionate about patient experience and healthcare\xa0', 'Creating, managing and refining the system used for incoming data requests\xa0\xa0', 'Analyzing patient engagement data and identify correlation with the clinical outcomes\xa0\xa0', 'Identifying inefficiencies in the ways in which data is stored and outputted and make thoughtful recommendations for improvement\xa0\xa0']

['', 'Experience with and data visualization tools a must (e.g. Mode, Looker, Tableau)', "Headquartered in San Francisco, Tempo's all-star team includes alumni from Google, YouTube, Netflix, Airbnb, Pixar, and Orangetheory, backed by $60 million in Series B funding from General Catalyst, Norwest Venture Partners, Founders Fund, Khosla Ventures, DCM, and Signal Fire.", 'Please apply and we will contact you!', 'Collaborate with analytics and engineering teams to address technical debts, continuously improve the data quality\xa0', '2-3 years of relevant experience in a quantitative focused analyst or analytics role in a fast-paced data-driven environment (start-up experience a plus)', 'Qualifications:', '2-3 years of relevant experience in a quantitative focused analyst or analytics role in a fast-paced data-driven environment (start-up experience a plus)Expert fluency in SQL-based data manipulationStrong communication skills and the ability to explain complex analyses to both technical and non-technical audiences.Meticulous attention to detail with an ability to learn quicklyExperience with and data visualization tools a must (e.g. Mode, Looker, Tableau)Must be able to manage multiple projects and work with key stakeholders across different departments', 'Meticulous attention to detail with an ability to learn quickly', 'Tempo is the first home fitness system that tracks your motion and gives you instant feedback to improve your form—providing a more effective and safer workout. Using 3D sensors and A.I., Tempo counts your reps, recommends weights, and enables expert trainers to guide you in real-time. Our flagship product, the Tempo Studio, is a complete home gym that packages a 42" HD touchscreen that streams live and on-demand class, a 115 lb weight set, and other accessories in a sleek, free-standing design.', 'Partner with various business units to establish KPIs (e.g. Customer Support, Supply Chain, Marketing), align on definitions/methodologies, and build reports to help track the metrics', 'Responsibilities:', 'Utilize proprietary data and third-party tools to build reports; analyze user behaviors, operational performance, and product usage; and facilitate data-driven decision making', 'Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex analyses to both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Utilize proprietary data and third-party tools to build reports; analyze user behaviors, operational performance, and product usage; and facilitate data-driven decision makingLead ad-hoc analysis projects to identify business growth or process improvement opportunities and present execution plans to help resolve the gaps and achieve business KPI targetsPartner with various business units to establish KPIs (e.g. Customer Support, Supply Chain, Marketing), align on definitions/methodologies, and build reports to help track the metricsCollaborate with analytics and engineering teams to address technical debts, continuously improve the data quality\xa0', 'Must be able to manage multiple projects and work with key stakeholders across different departments', 'We’re looking for an Associate Data Analyst to own projects specifically supporting our Customer and Business Operation teams. You will work closely with the leadership to provide data-driven insights and help identify the best opportunities to improve processes and drive business growth. If you’re passionate about fitness and want to join a fast growing startup, then we would love to meet you!', 'Expert fluency in SQL-based data manipulation', 'Lead ad-hoc analysis projects to identify business growth or process improvement opportunities and present execution plans to help resolve the gaps and achieve business KPI targets']

['', "A minimum of 5 years of progressive analysis/systems experience in large scale IT projectsStrong experience in SDLC - writing and analyzing requirements, interfacing with stakeholders, documentation, writing test plans and test casesHands-on SQL, experience conducting analysis, writing queries and reportingBachelor's Degree in Statistics, Computer Sciences, Information Technology, Engineering, Management of Information Systems, or equivalent work experienceAbility to support multiple projects simultaneously and work in a dynamic environmentExperience working in an Agile team and familiarity with Agile project management practicesExperience documenting business processes, requirements, and UAT", 'Strong experience in SDLC - writing and analyzing requirements, interfacing with stakeholders, documentation, writing test plans and test cases', 'Experience working in an Agile team and familiarity with Agile project management practices', 'A minimum of 5 years of progressive analysis/systems experience in large scale IT projects', 'Hands-on SQL, experience conducting analysis, writing queries and reporting', 'Our direct client is looking for a highly motivated Business / Data Analyst to support the Data Science Development lifecycle process and help solve complex business problems using predictive analytics/modeling approaches.', "Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Computer Sciences, Information Technology, Engineering, Management of Information Systems, or equivalent work experience", 'Experience documenting business processes, requirements, and UAT', 'Ability to support multiple projects simultaneously and work in a dynamic environment', 'Qualifications']

['', 'You have 3+ years of SQL experience, advanced Excel skills, and are familar with applied statistics', 'How you’ll make an impact:', 'You have completed a degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Engineering / related field, Marketing, or MBA with quantitative focus (or 2+ yrs prior experience in product analytics supporting digital applications including mobile apps)', 'Why Match Group?', 'This position sits on our Analytics team, which is based in Dallas and reports into the Director of Analytics and Data Science specifically supporting the Match brand', 'You will help with member market research by assisting with the design of questionnaires and analyzing the results', 'You are a self-starter with good communications skills and a desire to collaborate with others', 'applicants will be required to complete a SQL skills assessment testWhat’s the team like?This position sits on our Analytics team, which is based in Dallas and reports into the Director of Analytics and Data Science specifically supporting the Match brandThe Data Analysts serve as internal consultants, providing business guidance based on users. Simply put, we want to understand our customers: what they need, what they do, how to retain them and ultimately how to help them find the best datesOur team’s mission is to use data to deliver long-term strategic insights. We also provide short-term guidance on A/B tests and user behavior Why Match Group?Our mission is simple – to help people find love and happiness!We love our employees too – here are some examples how:Annual training budget for each employee100% employer match on 401k contributionsSpecific COVID-19 allowance for home office set-upMatched giving to qualified organizations100% paid Parental LeaveHappy Hours and Company events (they are all virtual now, but still a ton of fun!)We value diversity at our company and will never discriminate based on someone’s race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'What’s the team like?', 'applicants will be required to complete a SQL skills assessment testWhat’s the team like?', ' We could be a match if: ', 'Our team’s mission is to use data to deliver long-term strategic insights. We also provide short-term guidance on A/B tests and user behavior ', 'You will serve as an internal consultant to product managers, marketing and CRM teams on A/B tests as they move initiatives from concept to market by communicating business insights gleaned from your analysis of large data sets', 'You have experience going beyond number-crunching, reports, and dashboard creation -- you are able to understand the business impact of the data and make recommendations based on your findings', 'The Data Analysts serve as internal consultants, providing business guidance based on users. Simply put, we want to understand our customers: what they need, what they do, how to retain them and ultimately how to help them find the best dates', 'We value diversity at our company and will never discriminate based on someone’s race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'You will research issues about customer behavior/changes by analyzing relevant metrics and trends in order to support enterprise level initiatives']

job_title: Data Analyst/Senior Data Analyst, Central Operations
job_text: ['', 'Own data analysis and visualization as it relates to all areas of fulfillment; availability, order quality, profitability, efficiency, shopper and retailer performance, etc, as well as the identification of potential root causes contributing to potential change(s) in metrics', 'About You', 'Experience with R, Python, and/or Julia (fluency in at least one language preferred)', ' Minimum 5-7 years in analytics, business intelligence/operations, investment banking, or related environment Ability to write complex and performant queries in your dialect of SQL to extract data from our data warehouse (Hive or Presto experience a plus) Experience with R, Python, and/or Julia (fluency in at least one language preferred) Experience with analytical visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, Periscope or similar tools Extremely strong verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to synthesize complex topics and create compelling narratives for various audiences Excellent teamwork skills and desire to help others learn High level of accountability and ownership – driven and focused self-starter Strategic mindset – the ability to think ahead of where the company is at now Understanding of A/B testing and other forms of statistical analysis using statistical packages similar to R, SAS, or Pandas  ', 'Develop dashboards, analytical frameworks, and detailed reporting models that provide reliable, easily-digestible insights to key stakeholders to help guide decisions around process, policy, systems, and service models', 'Advanced degree in statistics or other quantitative fields', 'Create automated reporting to ensure operations leaders are informed of variations and opportunities across geographies and teams', 'Develop a deep understanding of how each area of the business impacts the other, as well as the underlying correlations relating to key company metrics', 'Experience in advanced reporting tools such as R Shiny, Dash, or Bokeh', ' Experience in Supply Chain or fulfillment-related field Experience in advanced reporting tools such as R Shiny, Dash, or Bokeh Advanced degree in statistics or other quantitative fields Data modeling, ETL and data pipeline development experience ', 'Excellent teamwork skills and desire to help others learn', 'Data modeling, ETL and data pipeline development experience', ' Own data analysis and visualization as it relates to all areas of fulfillment; availability, order quality, profitability, efficiency, shopper and retailer performance, etc, as well as the identification of potential root causes contributing to potential change(s) in metrics Regularly communicate associated outcomes and insights to various stakeholders at all levels, including senior management to help guide strategic decisions for improvement Develop dashboards, analytical frameworks, and detailed reporting models that provide reliable, easily-digestible insights to key stakeholders to help guide decisions around process, policy, systems, and service models Develop a deep understanding of how each area of the business impacts the other, as well as the underlying correlations relating to key company metrics Create automated reporting to ensure operations leaders are informed of variations and opportunities across geographies and teams Analyze unstructured behavioral data to discover operational events and activities impacting fulfillment quality and customer, shopper, and retailer experience Fundamentally change the way our teams across North America think about exceptional performance and customer experiences through innovative, value-added data approaches and insights Regularly collaborate with other analysts, subject matter experts, and decision-makers to develop data-driven policies and models to improve overall fulfillment performance ', 'Experience with analytical visualization tools such as Tableau, Looker, Periscope or similar tools', 'Strategic mindset – the ability to think ahead of where the company is at now', 'Analyze unstructured behavioral data to discover operational events and activities impacting fulfillment quality and customer, shopper, and retailer experience', 'Fundamentally change the way our teams across North America think about exceptional performance and customer experiences through innovative, value-added data approaches and insights', 'Experience in Supply Chain or fulfillment-related field', 'Overview', 'In your application, please describe the most impactful data project you have been a part of. Describe the problem, outcome/impact, and your role in the project.', 'Regularly communicate associated outcomes and insights to various stakeholders at all levels, including senior management to help guide strategic decisions for improvement', 'Ability to write complex and performant queries in your dialect of SQL to extract data from our data warehouse (Hive or Presto experience a plus)', 'Regularly collaborate with other analysts, subject matter experts, and decision-makers to develop data-driven policies and models to improve overall fulfillment performance', 'High level of accountability and ownership – driven and focused self-starter', 'Understanding of A/B testing and other forms of statistical analysis using statistical packages similar to R, SAS, or Pandas ', 'Extremely strong verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to synthesize complex topics and create compelling narratives for various audiences', 'About The Job', 'Minimum 5-7 years in analytics, business intelligence/operations, investment banking, or related environment', 'Bonus Points']
